title: Sketchbook Folio, "Sailboats and Birds on Choppy Sea", 1870–85
medium: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Dark, choppy sea across foreground. In middleground, right of center, a sailboat. A second sailboat farther back, at center. On horizon, three additional sailboats in far distance - two at left-center and one at right. Birds in sky at left-center.
